subsection_content:
Crystalline silicon is the culprit that causes the disease. Therefore, to prevent this disease, you first need to minimize your exposure to silica dust. If you have to work regularly in an environment containing crystalline silicon, you need to:
Wear a mask and protective clothing while working;; Use the wetting method to cut, plan or grind materials;; Take a shower and change clothes after work;; Do not eat or drink in or near areas containing silica dust;; Wash hands and face before eating.
For those who do not work in environments containing silica dust, to prevent disease, do the following:
Maintain weight with a healthy, balanced diet;; Move as much as possible by exercising regularly, but don't overexert yourself;; Prevent respiratory infections by getting vaccinated against influenza and pneumococcal pneumonia as recommended by your doctor.
